feed.title: Play The Field
feed.subtitle: Play The Field is three college buddies talking about everything you need to know regarding the major sports organizations in the world and top collegiate athletics. Top headlines and topics will be discussed and debates are encouraged. It might even get a little heated, tune in!

author.name: High Tops Media & Tyler Purdy, Max Adams, and Liam Spellman

entry.title: Winners and Losers of the NBA Playoffs to this point + Is CP3 a Winner? And a word about the shooting at Robb Elementary - Season 1 Episode 6

link.title: Winners and Losers of the NBA Playoffs to this point + Is CP3 a Winner? And a word about the shooting at Robb Elementary - Season 1 Episode 6

entry.content:
This week on Play The Field, Liam and Max recap game 7 of the Phoenix/Dallas series, cover the conference finals, give you the top 5 winners and losers of this year’s NBA playoffs, and much, much more!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/playthefieldpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: The Joker Wins Back to Back MVPs - Season 1 Episode 5

link.title: The Joker Wins Back to Back MVPs - Season 1 Episode 5

entry.content:
This week on Play The Field, Liam, Max, and Tyler talk about the current NBA playoff series and how they are unfolding. Plus, they give their takes on the top five remaining players in the NBA playoffs.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/playthefieldpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Winners of the NFL Draft and it’s the Ja Show - Season 1 Episode 4

link.title: Winners of the NFL Draft and it’s the Ja Show - Season 1 Episode 4

entry.content:
This week on Play The Field, Liam, Max, and Tyler talk about the winners and losers of the 2022 NFL Draft. They also discuss the current series in the NBA playoffs and give their bets for the week.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/playthefieldpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: Introducing Play The Field - Season 1 Episode 0

link.title: Introducing Play The Field - Season 1 Episode 0

entry.content:
Play The Field, hosted by Tyler Purdy, Max Adams, & Liam Spellman, is three college buddies talking about everything you need to know regarding the major sports organizations in the world and top collegiate athletics. Top headlines and topics will be discussed and debates are encouraged. It might even get a little heated! Be sure to tune in on Wednesdays, you won’t want to miss it!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/playthefieldpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
